column1: | effie e. bobo effie e. bobo. november 17
column7: 2015 in booneville. she was born on november 17
column9: texas to the late david leslie and lovie (gunner) clark. she worked as a ward secretary in texas memorial hospital and booneville community hospital. she was a member of first assembly of god church in paris. she is preceded in death by her parents; her husband
column10: kenneth dewey bobo; a brother and three sisters. she is survived by two sons and daughters-in-law
column11: robert and wanda bobo of ratcliff and donald edward and suzanne bobo of kodiak
column13: howard and heidi clark of nebraska; five grandchildren
column17: jason bobo and keeley bobo; three great grandchildren
column19: trisha drake and kevin drake. visitation will be held from 6:00-8:00 p. m.
column22: 2015 at roller funeral home chapel in paris. funeral service will be held at 10:00 a. m.
column25: 2015 at roller funeral home chapel with rev. kenny maness officiating. burial will be in oakhill cemetery in booneville under the direction of roller funeral home.
